data.title: Microsoft Events
data.meta_description: Find an upcoming Microsoft or partner event.
data.text:
CPS: Everything you need to know before you rollout Copilot for Microsoft 365

Copilot is a powerful tool that helps you manage your Microsoft 365 environment with ease. But before you start using it, you need to understand some key aspects of data governance, compliance and adoption that will affect your deployment and adoption strategy.

Kocho: Microsoft Defender XDR Demo: Simplifying SecOps

In this practical webinar, we look at how Microsoft’s Extended Detection and Response (XDR) platform creates a central hub for unified security management of your endpoints, identities, email, and cloud workloads. Including demos of Microsoft Defender for Identity, Office 365 and Endpoint.

Coeo: Interactive Strategy Session: Future-Proof Your Business with Data Modernisation

Cloud enables business growth, with AI driving migrations. Data modernisation is key to unlocking cloud potential. Join our session to learn how to update data systems, choose the right Azure SQL option, save money, and migrate safely.

Wellington: FuturePMO Tech Summit

Understand how Microsoft Project for the Web & the Power Platform can completely transform your PMO into the future! Hear from industry experts, understand what the FuturePMO looks like, see a solution demo, and learn directly from other organisations that have already transitioned to Microsoft.

Greymatter: ISV Partner Day

The only Microsoft-focused UK event for ISVs, SaaS providers, and app builders. Connect with our experts and gain insights into cloud security, AI, dev tools, mapping, and Azure optimisation. The place to be to learn the latest in Microsoft technologies to help build & innovate amazing applications.

mhance: What’s Coming in the October Wave Release for the Power Platform

Join us for an exclusive webinar on the Power Platform October release, where we will share the latest features and updates that will help you build low-code solutions for your business challenges. Don’t miss this opportunity for a sneak peek of the latest updates.

mhance: What’s Coming in the October Wave Release for Dynamics 365 Customer Insights – Journeys

Join us for an exclusive webinar on the Dynamics 365 Customer Insights – Journeys October release, where we will share the latest features and updates that will help you create and execute effective marketing campaigns. Don’t miss this opportunity for a sneak peek of the latest updates.

mhance: What’s Coming in the October Wave Release for Dynamics 365 Sales & Service

Join us for a webinar on the Dynamics 365 Sales and Service October release, where we will share the latest features and updates that will help you boost your sales/fundraising performance and deliver exceptional customer service. Don’t miss this opportunity for a sneak peek of the latest updates.

Program Framework: Microsoft has changed it's Project line up – Meet the new Planner and Planner Premium services

Microsoft’s new Planner have now been launched and are available in your Microsoft 365 tenant. But what does this mean for you? Join us as we cover everything you need to know, running through the key features, licensing changes, extensibility options and of course Copilot capabilities.

Kocho: Microsoft VIEW 2024: Security, Identity, Endpoint and Cloud Thought Leadership

We’ll show how Microsoft security, identity, endpoint management, and cloud transformation, can drive operational efficiency and competitive advantage. Designed for senior decision-makers, you’ll walk away knowing what’s hot for 2025 and how it will inform your organisation’s future strategy.

Bridewell: Ensure Data Privacy and Compliance with Microsoft Purview

Chris Linnell, Principal Data Privacy Consultant, will share the most common data-related challenges facing organisations and how they can use Microsoft Purview to overcome them. This will include practical guidance on how to manage your own rollout of Purview and utilise the platforms key features.

CPS: Meet Copilot & the new Planner: An interactive event in Manchester

Join our Microsoft Copilot & Planner event in September with Microsoft and CPS. Discover new features, attend workshops, get a free assessment, and enhance your workflow. Open to all professionals.

Transparity: EASM: The Evolution of the Market & Microsoft's Approach

Do you know the extent of your external attack surface? Join us for this exclusive webinar hosted in partnership with Microsoft, as we share the latest updates to the world of External Attack Surface Management, and Microsoft’s approach.

Transparity: Data Strategy: People, Partners & Owning Data Solutions

Make your data work for your team. In this webinar, our Data & AI experts will explore the most important consideration in data strategy – how it will impact your people. We’ll explore essential considerations when considering your data strategy including how to create a data-driven culture.

Transparity: Data Strategy: Data Platforms & Me - Technology that Fits

In this webinar, we’ll explore platform as part of your data strategy from choosing the right platform for you to getting the best value from your platform of choice. Explore battle-tested architecture blueprints, how to balance scale and cost, and how to navigate migrating data platforms

Performanta: Navigating the Future of Cybersecurity in Healthcare

Performanta and Microsoft are co-hosting an exclusive breakfast event: Navigating the Future of Cybersecurity in Healthcare Performanta as he demonstrates the capabilities of SIEM and XDR. Watch live demonstrations of Microsoft Copilot for Security and Performanta's Safe Platform

FuturePMO Tech Summit

Understand how Microsoft Project for the Web & the Power Platform can completely transform your PMO into the future! Hear from industry experts, understand what the FuturePMO looks like, see a solution demo, and learn directly from other organisations that have already transitioned to Microsoft.

FuturePMO Tech Summit

Understand how Microsoft Project for the Web & the Power Platform can completely transform your PMO into the future! Hear from industry experts, understand what the FuturePMO looks like, see a solution demo, and learn directly from other organisations that have already transitioned to Microsoft.

FuturePMO Tech Summit

Understand how Microsoft Project for the Web & the Power Platform can completely transform your PMO into the future! Hear from industry experts, understand what the FuturePMO looks like, see a solution demo, and learn directly from other organisations that have already transitioned to Microsoft.

Modern Work Discovery Series: Transforming telephony with Teams Phone Mobile

Watch this webinar to: - Understand how Teams Phone simplifies telephony for every user. - Explore how Teams Phone Mobile extends this capability for the mobile-first era. - Hear from BT about how they are bringing Teams Phone Mobile to the UK!

Modern Work Discovery Series: Collaboration, Evolved: Drive engagement and inclusivity through a rich meetings experience

Gone are the days where work is performed in silos. Effective Collaboration is a hallmark of a successful organisation!

Modern Work Discovery Series: Transforming telephony for your users

On this webinar we will explore how Microsoft Teams Phone can provide a cost-effective and powerful route to transform the user experience - enabling users to work where, when, and how they want!

Modern Work Discovery Series: What's New: The Evolution of the Meeting

Join this session to explore how organisations can support their users through effective Meeting experiences, and to learn about the latest innovations that enable inclusive and accessible meetings - irrespective of location.

Modern Work Discovery Series: What's New: OKRs - New Year, New You

Watch this webinar to understand how to implement OKRs into the rhythm of your business and get the entire organisation aligned to promote business growth, profitability and leverage resources strategically.

Microsoft Teams as an enabler for Human Resources

Discover the right tools and resources in this new world of work. Optimise and improve remote on-boarding processes or upskilling programs and learn how to attract, hire, retain and support talent.

Microsoft Teams empowers Frontline workers

Join to discover how Teams empowers a diverse Frontline community with features and tools that put accessibility at the forefront, protect work-life balance, promote ideas and sharing, and connect people to their company.

Microsoft Teams: Accelerate sustainability outcomes using Microsoft 365 technology

At Microsoft we see digital transformation and sustainability as inextricably linked. Watch this content to find out how our Modern Work solutions play a role in accelerating your sustainability strategy.

Microsoft Teams Industry Special: Healthcare

As a healthcare leader, you strive to empower your organisation to deliver the best possible care. Join us for a Healthcare Industry Special event where you will learn more about technology, Microsoft Teams and how to make the most of the tools that you are already paying for today.

Microsoft Teams: Boost productivity in your organisation by developing integrations for your line of business apps

In this session we will look how Microsoft Teams provides a holistic solution for both Developers and Business Decision Makers by offering the organisational layer that brings everything together.

Microsoft Teams as an enabler for a data-driven culture with business intelligence for all

During this session we will cover how to build powerful end-to-end business solutions by bringing data analytics and visualisation tools to Microsoft Teams. We’ll also learn how different organisations successfully foster data driven decision making and business innovation across teams.

Teams as an enabler for Hybrid Meetings

During this session, we will discuss critical business challenges related to communication and collaboration solutions, demonstrate how Microsoft Teams can help remove blockers, and share resources available to drive adoption.

Teams as an enabler for Innovation

During this session, we will hear from our customers on how Microsoft Teams has enabled them to thrive through innovative new ways of working. Our engineering team and partners will also join us in the discussion as they share some of their best practices.

Teams as an enabler for service management

Whether it is making IT announcements, answering FAQs with a bot, or collaborating on cases, Microsoft Teams can enable your IT Service Management team a more connected experience. Organisations will see the benefits through improved employee engagement and optimised customer interactions.

Teams for Work and Project Management

Learn how Microsoft Teams gives you the power and simplicity to be successful.

Teams as an Internal Comms Platform

Learn more about how Microsoft Teams can enable your Internal Comms teams to drive better employee engagement.

Microsoft Teams as an enabler for personal productivity and wellbeing

Join this session to learn how Microsoft Teams can enable a healthier work-life balance. We've invited team managers, frontline workers, and subject matter experts to share their tips and tricks on how to stay on top of your workload and wellbeing and empower others to achieve more

Microsoft Teams and the collaborative apps that connect people, processes, and solutions

Join this session to learn how organizations across UK are using Apps in Teams to empower real-time interaction and make collaboration more engaging and productive. We will review top of mind security and governance policies, most popular apps and use cases that have managed to bring the best part of ...

Microsoft Teams Industry Special: Police Service

Join our Industry Special Discovery Day to hear more about industry best practices, learn from product and subject matter experts how you can use Power Platform technology to enhance the working day of a police officer, and find out how to make the most out of familiar apps in Microsoft Teams.

Microsoft Teams as an enabler for employee wellbeing and the future of work

The session will showcase customers and partners who have learned to foster a culture that empowers people and teams to be their best from anywhere.

Microsoft Teams Industry Special: Professional Services

Professional services firms are needing to adapt to the changing needs of their customers and their staff. A long-term shift towards more agile service delivery methods is coinciding with a rapid change in working habits, creating an urgent need for supporting technology.

ISDN Switch Off

With the upcoming ISDN switch off set to be in 2025, the time for change from analogue to digital is now. During this session we will look at how Microsoft Teams Phone can support your organisation's journey to modernise your communications.

Teams and Power Platform as enablers to transform business processes

Within this session, we look at how Teams and Power Platforms are an enabler to help transform your business processes. You will hear from a series of speakers from Microsoft, our partners and customers on what they've learnt.
